name: EXPEDITED SHIPPING
description: CHOOSING THIS OPTION WILL ALLOW YOUR PRODUCT TO SHIP WITHIN 3-5 BUSINESS DAYS INSTEAD OF THE STANDARD 7-10 BUSINESS DAYS. YOUR ADDRESS MUST BE VERIFIED AND YOUR PAYMENT MUST HAVE CLEARED IN ORDER FOR THIS OPTION TO BE APPLICABLE TO YOU.

name: U-Part and lace Custom Units
description:
Introducing the Alter Ego Wig Collection, Custom units with personality Creating a New You!!

Each Unit will be created in your image of how you would like for it to look. 
Request are accepted, however, they must be feasible and be possible to create. 
Custom colors are available, However, ombre pricing WILL apply and must be applied in your cart during checkout. 

IF YOUR ARE PROVIDING YOUR OWN HAIR YOU MAY SEND BUNDLES TO 

SENSATIONAL HAIR EXTENSIONS
3367 WAINRIGHT LN 
SAN DIEGO, CA 92123

Creating each unit will be treated as the same process as a sew in therefore pricing is as follows. 

$100 to create the unit plus the cost of hair
if you'd wish to provide your own hair it wil be $150 

you can choose to have a U-part inspired wig or Lace closure.

name: T-SHIRTS & TANK TOPS
description:
INTRODING THE S.H.E for HER TEES AND TANKS BY SENSATIONAL HAIR EXTENTIONS!!! 

ALL COLORS AVAILABLE!! JUST EMAIL OR TEXT THE COLOR OF YOUR CHOICE AFTER PURCHASE

NOW AVAILABLE FOR PRE-ORDER!!! 
SUPPORT THE MOVEMENT ORDER YOURS TODAY

TEES AND TANKS ARE $15 WITH ANY HAIR PURCHASE AND $35 SOLD SEPERATELY
SHIRTS RUN SMALL SO BE SURE TO AT LEAST GO 1 SIZE UP

WHEN PURCHASING WITH HAIR USE CODE TEETANK TO GET THE APPLICABLE PRICING.

name: OMBRE COLOR/FULL COLOR
description:
Ombre option is available for all origins and textures of hair. you can choose get 1 or all of your bundles done.

once order is placed, send an email requesting the type of ombre color your interested in. 

FULL color is also available for all origins and textures of hair. 
to request the full bundle color simply choose from the drop down box below and send an email afterward requesting the color that you'd like. 

C/C= COLOR CHANGE

ALL EMAIL AND COLOR REQUEST MAY BE SENT TO 
SENSATIONALHAIR89@GMAIL.COM
